full_summary:
### Highway Trailer Rental
#### Solicitation Number: 21C40-24-4503301/A
#### Date of Publication: 2023-11-23
#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-21T14:00:00

### Request for Standing Offer

**Solicitation Description**

The Correctional Service of Canada – CORCAN Ontario Region is seeking a contractor to provide monthly rental services for up to 25 highway trailers for the National Warehouse Distribution Centre, Bath Institution, Collins Bay Institution, Joyceville Institution, Millhaven Institution and Warkworth Institution within the Ontario Region.

**Trade Agreements**

This tendering opportunity is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Tendering Procedures**

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The lowest priced compliant bid will be selected.

**Standing Offer Period**

The work will be performed from the date of Standing Offer award to January 31, 2025, with an option to renew for two additional one-year periods.

**Deliverables**

The Contractor must perform the following:

1. Deliver trailers to the destination specified in the contract
2. Pick-up trailers at time of Standing Offer expiry
3. Provide trailer licensing, permits, or exemptions during the rental periods for each trailer
4. Maintain trailers related to normal wear and tear (e.g., replacement of tires and tire repairs)
5. Supply another licensed trailer of the same type and size to replace a trailer when it is taken out of service for repairs for a period greater than 24 hours
6. Deliver trailers within 24 hours from receipt of notification from the Project Authority
7. Include unlimited kilometres during the rental periods for each trailer
8. Perform annual safety inspections and provide associated documentation to the Project Authority

**Location of Work**

The Contractor must deliver the trailers to the destinations listed below:

* National Warehouse Distribution Centre: 1484 Centennial Drive, Kingston, ON
* Bath Institution: 5775 Bath Road, Bath, ON
